name: Sacrifice Em' All
description:
[A GAME FOR SPOOKTOBER JAM 2021]

"I had more plans for the game but due to time restrictions I couldnt add them all. But still, I hope you have fun like I did while developing the game"

- Pwerrr

[LORE AND STUFF]
The God himself woke you up at 2 AM for you to sacrifice your kids. In return he said he would give you anything you've ever wanted. You belived him, you took your pistol and opened your 1st kid's room.....

[Controls]

WASD/Arrow Keys - Movement

Right Mouse Button - Aim

Left Mouse Button - Shoot

(Powerup Only) Left Shift - Dash
